recipe.title: Mini Chicken Tacos Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; spanish rice, cooked ; (225 g)
¼ cup ; mexican blend cheese ; (25 g)

steps.step: Place shredded chicken in a reusable container and fold flour tortillas and place on top of the chicken. Add onions, tortillas, cooked Spanish rice, black beans, lettuce, and cheese using cupcake tin liners to separate toppings. Place salsa in a small reusable container.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Place shredded chicken in a reusable container and fold flour tortillas and place on top of the chicken.
Add onions, tortillas, cooked Spanish rice, black beans, lettuce, and cheese using cupcake tin liners to separate toppings.
Place salsa in a small reusable container.
